content: Generation revenues increased to $9.6 million from $7.5 million, primarily due to the fact that we recorded a full quarter of generation revenues associated with the Long Island Power Authority project in Yaphank, New York, which achieved commercial operations in December 2021 and the fact that the project at the U.S. Navy Submarine Base in Groton, Connecticut or the Groton Project achieved commercial operations and began generating revenues in the first quarter of fiscal 2023.
